TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Framework Agreement Field Camp Tents and Accessories

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Swedish Armed Forces (SwAF) is underway to expand the amount of field camp tents within its organization. The procurement refers to new field camp tent 12 and tent 20 based on existing drawing material and includes tent fabric, soft floor, side pole, ground stake, drying system, guy line and carrying system. The contract is estimated to have a total validity period of seven (7) years (maximum time, including all options).

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: A register extract or a certificate showing that the tenderer fulfils the preconditions to pursue professional activity.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Annual report showing that the requirements on the economic and financial standing of the tenderer are fulfilled.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Description and reference for completed assignments showing that the requirements on the technical and professional capacity of the tenderer are fulfilled.
